## TridionActivityDefinition.allowOverrideDueDate property

A value indicating whether "Activity.DueDate" can be changed manually, or not. true if "Activity.DueDate" can be changed manually otherwise, false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get allowOverrideDueDate(): boolean;
```
